game.title: The Lost City of Eldarath
game.synopsis: In a world where magic has disappeared, the last remnants of humanity cling to existence in a harsh and unforgiving land. The city of Brindlemark is one of the few remaining bastions of hope, but it is on the brink of destruction as the dark forces of the Shadow Empire close in for the kill.
game.beginning: The game begins with the player character, a young apprentice wizard named Eryndor Thorne, receiving a cryptic message from a mysterious stranger. The message speaks of an ancient city deep in the heart of the forbidden forest, where powerful artifacts and relics lie waiting to be discovered.
game.ending: As the player delves deeper into the mysteries of Eldarath, they will uncover a hidden prophecy that speaks of their own destiny: to wield the power of the gods and bring light back to a world consumed by darkness. The final battle will take place atop a ruined spire, where the player must face off against the mastermind behind the Shadow Empire's rise to power.
